Title: Grot Wolf Riders
Intro: Each model in a Grot Wolf Riders unit is armed with one of the following weapon options: Slitta and Wolf Bow; Pokin’ Spear; or Pokin’ Spear and Grot Shield. All models in the unit must be armed with the same weapon option.

Rules.Name: Shield
Rules.Rule: SHIELD: If this unit is armed with Grot Shields, it has a Save characteristic of 4+ instead of 5+.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit’s Giant Wolves are each armed with Slavering Jaws.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Grot Wolf Rider Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapon.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit if it includes any Standard Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to charge rolls for this unit if it includes any Hornblowers.

Rules.Name: Pounce
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES This unit is eligible to fight in the combat phase if it is within 6" of an enemy unit instead of 3", and models in this unit can move an extra 3" when they pile in.
